required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Investigate the Pharmacodynamic Effect of a Single Dose of AZD2516 in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Two-centre, Phase IIa Pharmacodynamic Cross-over Study to Assess the Effect of AZD2516 on the Total Number of Reflux Episodes in Healthy Male Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the pharmacodynamic effect of AZD2516 in healthy male subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: A double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled, two-centre, phase IIa pharmacodynamic cross-over study to assess the effect of AZD2516 on the total number of reflux episodes in healthy male volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: Reflux Episodes 0 to 3 Hours Post Meal
primary_outcome.description: Total number of reflux episodes 0 to 3 hours post meal

secondary_outcome.measure: Transient Lower Esophagus Sphincter Relaxations (TLESRs) 0 to 3 Hours Post Meal
secondary_outcome.description: Number of TLESRs 0 to 3 hours post meal were calculated based upon the manometric analysis fpr the 3-hour post-meal period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Curve(AUC)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration vs. time curve from time zero to 12-hours post dose calculated by loglinear trapezoidal method

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically Relevant Change of Laboratory Variables
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with clinically relevant change of laboratory variables as judged by the responsible medical officer.

arm_group.description: period 1: placebo, period 2: washout, period 3: AZD2516 40 mg, period 4: washout, period 5: AZD2516 5 mg, period 6: washout, period 7: AZD2516 16 mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Provision of signed informed consent
- Healthy male subjects
- Age 18-45 years, inclusive
Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinically significant illness within the 2 weeks prior to the first dose of study drug
- History of clinically significant cardiovascular, respiratory, renal, hepatic, neurological, mental or gastrointestinal disease
- Need for concomitant medications during the study

participant_flow.recruitment_details: In total 25 participants were enrolled into the study at 2 medical centres (14 and 11 participants), 20 of them were randomised to treatment (10 at each medical centre) and all these 20 participants completed the study.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: After enrolment, participant's eligibility for assignment to treatment was based on inclusion and exclusion criteria.

group.title: First 5 mg, Then Placebo, Then 16 mg, Then 40 mg
group.description: period 1: AZD2516 5 mg, period 2: washout, period 3: placebo, period 4: washout, period 5: AZD2516 16 mg, period 6: washout, period 7: AZD2516 40 mg.

group.title: First 40 mg, Then 16 mg, Then Placebo, Then 5 mg
group.description: period 1: AZD2516 40 mg, period 2: washout, period 3: AZD2516 16 mg, period 4: washout, period 5: placebo, period 6: washout, period 7: AZD2516 5 mg.

group.title: First 16 mg, Then 5 mg, Then 40 mg, Then Placebo
group.description: period 1: AZD2516 16 mg, period 2: washout, period 3: AZD2516 5 mg, period 4: washout, period 5: AZD2516 40 mg, period 6: washout, period 7: placebo.

group.title: First Placebo, Then 40 mg, Then 5 mg, Then 16 mg
group.description: period 1: placebo, period 2: washout, period 3: AZD2516 40 mg, period 4: washout, period 5: AZD2516 5 mg, period 6: washout, period 7: AZD2516 16 mg

group.title: AZD2516 5 mg
group.description: Loading dose: 3 * AZD2516 1 mg capsules. Maintenance doses: 1 * AZD2516 1 mg capsule, 2 * placebo capsules and 1 * AZD2516 1 mg capsule, 2 * placebo capsules.

group.title: AZD2516 16 mg
group.description: Loading dose: 2 * AZD2516 5mg capsule, 1 * placebo capsule. Maintenance dose: 3 * AZD2516 1 mg capsule and 3 * AZD2516 1 mg capsule.

group.title: AZD2516 40 mg
group.description: Loading dose: 2 * AZD2616 10 mg capsules, 1 * placebo capsule. Maintenance dose: 2 * AZD2616 5 mg capsules, 1 * placebo capsule and 2 * AZD2616 5 mg capsules, 1 * placebo capsule.

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Loading dose: 3 * placebo capsules. Maintenance dose: 3 * placebo capsules and 3 * placebo capsules.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Reflux Episodes 0 to 3 Hours Post Meal
outcome.description: Total number of reflux episodes 0 to 3 hours post meal
outcome.population: Data from two subjects (one in arm AZD2516 5 mg, and one in arm Placebo) were excluded from efficacy analysis due to incorrect medication received.

outcome.title: Transient Lower Esophagus Sphincter Relaxations (TLESRs) 0 to 3 Hours Post Meal
outcome.description: Number of TLESRs 0 to 3 hours post meal were calculated based upon the manometric analysis fpr the 3-hour post-meal period.
outcome.population: Data from two subjects were excluded from efficacy analysis due to incorrect medication received Data from five visits from two subject were excluded form analysis due to deviations caused by technical problems.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
